Trente-deux reproductions des maquettes en couleurs, d'après les originaux des costumes & décor par Picasso pour le ballet "Le Tricorne"
Picasso, Pablo, 1881-1973
PR 319
1 Linear feet (32 prints in 1 box).
1920 Reproductions of Picasso's watercolor designs for the ballet Le Tricorne (The Three-Cornered Hat), issued by Éditions Paul Rosenberg, Paris, 1920. To request this item for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record, or write to printroom@nyhistory.org.
